title: What playback modes does my phone support?
answer:
l   Play in order (default): plays songs from the first and stops when the last song is played in a playlist.  


 l   Shuffle: plays all the songs in a playlist in a random order, once only. 

 l   Repeat playlist: repeats all the songs in a playlist in sequence again and again. 

 l   Repeat song: repeats the current playing song again and again.
